name: Chorizo: Monkey Mountain Holiday!
description:
Pro-wrestlers need vacations, too. Chorizo, the Luchaboar, has gone to Monkey Mountain for some much needed R&R, but instead got his shorts stolen by Big Dong and his monkey boys. Help Chorizo get his little red butt covered up before the chicas show up!

  • Art: Alejandro Paz
  • Engineering: Jer  Boniface
  • Music/Sound Design: Bryan Brunt
  • Title Animation: Nick Millward

for more of Alejandro's art, check out www.chorizocomic.com!

*Changelog 1.0.1*
- Chorizo no longer gets stuck on Big Dong or his monkey minions
- If Chorizo beats Big Dong and walks to the end of the screen, the game fully resets instead of partially
- the first monkey minion in the second room can hit Chorizo before an action is taken
